column5:
Merge pull request #74 from seansouthern/patch-1

Update actionbar/src/com/markupartist/android/widget/ActionBar.java

Update actionbar/src/com/markupartist/android/widget/ActionBar.java

Fixed very small typo in a comment
Changed to api level 10 and added scm and distribution management.
default.properties: lower minimum Android version from 2.2 to 2.1
Added Gyuri Grell to the list of contributors, thank you.

Added styles to home actionbar home logo so that margins can be modified by overriding styles.

Signed-off-by: Gyuri Grell <ggrell@pobox.com>

A method to remove the "home" action, though really all it does is hide
it.  I'm a bit unsure of what the right implementation is for this,
though I know I need the functionality.
Updated the example project to include removeAction and removeActionAt.
Add a new method to remove all actions from the actionbar.
Added Jesse Vincent to list of contributors. Thank you
typo fix to a resource name
Added a stock build.xml so users can build the sample app from the CLI
Added a "back indicator" compatible with the honeycomb API and UI
Updated the README about the current status.
Added Jake Wharton to contributors. Thank you
Changed the method signature to be more consistent with the Android API.
Added separate style for ProgressBar to make it easier to override the default style.
Update example to include indeterminate progress bar.
Remove the background from the RelativeLayout, allowing the ActionBar style background to show through
Changed back the format of the code and added the new function like the guidelines on https://github.com/johannilsson/sthlmtraveling/wiki/An-Introduction-for-Developers
Added functionality to set a onClickListener on the title TextView (after some discussion with johannilsson)
Added list of contributors. Thank you
Added example (comment out) from ohhorob example to show how one could override the default style.

Minor adaptions to ohorob's patch.

* Added a new style `ActionBarHomeItem` for the `actionbar_home_btn`, this
  allows it to be customized independent from the `ActionBarItem` that might
  not always look the same.
* Replaced wrap_content with values from `@dimen/actionbar_item_width` and
  `@dimen/actionbar_item_height`. Caused the action bar height to break
  otherwise.
Fixes the Library style, and overrides in the Example project for demontration purposes; Includes updating the actionbar_item layout to use the ActionBarItem style
Update ActionBar Example project to use a full-size drawable in the home position
Ignore Android SDK generated files that are specific to each project

Actionbar layout height reverted to wrap_content, allowing Action Items to be styled for appearance

Also introduce an ActionBarItem style that sizes for content, and removes padding and margin, permitting a bar-size drawable
Added support for setting the title from the layout file, closes #4.
Changed to pass Action instead of the IntentAction to setHomeAction, closes #3
- Minor Doxygen fixes and removal of unused imports.
- Workaround for the fact that there isn't a clean way to do scrolling TextViews in Android.
Added the possibility to set a logo to the action bar. This is ment to be used instead of the setHomeAction.
Renamed package for ActionBar to be more consistent with Androids widgets.
Removed title since we don't support that yet.
Added a new layout for the OtherActivity
